name: letters of stories in our heads
name_original: letters of stories in our heads
description:
Make sure you go fullscreen, a lot better that way!

A Twine game about stories and thoughts in the heads of various Australian characters.

Click blue links (replies and names) to continue. Click back button to go back.

This game is a simple little idea I had for an interactive fiction game of receiving and replying to letters and they're all about little stories and they all connect with each other through the characters.

I liked the idea because it gives you that feeling of how people's lives are connected and intertwine with each other.
